data.title: Genesis Exhibits
data.meta_description:
Genesis Exhibits | 2,251 followers on LinkedIn. Crafting REMARKable brand experiences for over 35 yrs. In-person/hybrid/virtual solutions for trade shows+corp spaces. | Genesis Exhibits has been providing world-class trade show displays and event marketing products and services for more than 35 years. We offer in-person/virtual/hybrid events, exhibits and environments including custom island exhibits, modular display systems, large format graphics, complete design services, company meeting event management, lobby/retail environments, asset management, rentals, road tours, booth staff training, lead management services and marketing seminars. 

Genesis Exhibits is highly recognized in the Greater New York area, San Francisco and around the world, for responsive client support, creative design work, and innovative turn-key event marketing solutions.

We're thrilled to announce Al Mercuroâ€™s appointment as a new 2025 judge for the prestigious Eventex Awards! Eventex Awards, founded in 2009, is the most recognizable accolade in the event industry, showcasing excellence, creativity, and innovation in producing cutting-edge events and experiences worldwide. Al Mercuro joins an esteemed group of industry leaders, including renowned journalists, association heads, and top influencers. His expertise will help Eventex continue to honor outstanding achievements across the global events landscape.
